resources:
Seven Swipe up to begin (after 5 sec. break) … 5 seconds break before first exercise … OK Cancel seconds Chosen duration: (Standard: Confirmation Do you really want to reset? //Statistics Overall time: Count: Average: Sort entries by name by count by overall time by average name count overall time (h:m:s) average (m:s) //Intro Seven Thanks for choosing \"Seven\". It\'s open source and complete free (as in freedom). Gestures Swipe down on the image to make a break, swipe up to continue with the workout. Swipe right to reach the previous exercise and left to skip the current one. Settings There are same basic settings for the app (duration of exercises and breaks, choose exercises). You can also open a statistic overview over done exercises. Now, let\'s start … //Menu Settings Settings | Help | About Reset durations Settings Advanced Miscellaneous Duration per exercise Set different duration per exercise. Statistics Show some information about performed exercises, total time and average per exercise. Endless Start workout again after last exercise. TTS Do you want to hear voice commands? Whistle Do you want to hear a whistle after each exercise? Duration: Workout Duration: Break Exercises Choose the exercises you want to perform. //Snackbar A short Break … … let\'s start again! Done! That\'s the first exercise. That\'s the last exercise. Please change from right to left side. //Titles 1. Exercise - Jumping jacks 2. Exercise - Wall sit 3. Exercise - Push ups 4. Exercise - Abdominal crunch 5. Exercise - Step up on chair 6. Exercise - Squat 7. Exercise - Tricepts on chair 8. Exercise - Plank 9. Exercise - High knees running 10. Exercise - Lunge 11. Exercise - Push up with rotation 12. Exercise - Side plank right 12. Exercise - Side plank left 1. Exercise 2. Exercise 3. Exercise 4. Exercise 5. Exercise 6. Exercise 7. Exercise 8. Exercise 9. Exercise 10. Exercise 11. Exercise 12. Exercise Jumping jacks Wall sit Push ups Abdominal crunch Step up on chair Squat Tricepts on chair Plank High knees running Lunge Push up with rotation Side plank Break - then: Wall sit Break - then: Push ups" Break - then: Abdominal crunch Break - then: Step up on chair Break - then: Squat Break - then: Tricepts on chair" Break - then: Plank Break - then: High knees running Break - then: Lunge Break - then: Push up with rotation Break - then: Side plank right Break - please change sides //License Dialog Copyright © 2016 by Gaukler Faun For more information visit the project site on github: https://github.com/scoute-dich/Sieben

If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses. // About About … and other things Changelog, help, license, used libraries and more. Developer Used resources Contributors French translation Small fixes and whistle Japanese translation Spanish translation Changelog Open Github site and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) License The app is licensed under GPL and completely open source and free (as in freedom). Gaukler Faun Open my profile on Github (needs internet connection). Intro Show the intro screen one more time. Donate If you like the app, you can donate to me via Paypal (needs internet connection). Workout images Whistle The pictures from the workout can be found on the Blog of \"C. Gilbert\". Thanks to her for the permission to use them in the app. The whistle is available under the Creative Commons 0 License. Used to build the intro screen. Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons.
